item.title: loggerとprintとtqdmの併用
item.description: logger と print と tqdm を併用する場合は以下のコードをコピペする。 参考 https://github.com/tqdm/tqdm#redirecting-writing https://qiita.com/mino-38/items/f09251d18fe3181bfbfd https://waregawa-log.hatenablog.com/entry/2020/01/01/100000 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/384076/how-can-i-color-python-logging-output import contextlib import logging import logging.handlers import sys from time import sleep from tqdm import tqdm from tqdm.contrib import DummyTqdmFile class TqdmLoggingHandler(logging.Handler): colors = {"INFO": "\033[37m{}\033[0m", "ERROR": "\033[31m{}\033[0m"} def __init__(self, level=logging.NOTSET): super().__init__(level) def emit(self, record): try: record.msg = TqdmLoggingHandler.colors.get(record.levelname, "{}").format( record.msg ) msg = self.format(record) tqdm.write(msg, file=sys.stderr) self.flush() except Exception: self.handleError(record) class CustomFormatter(logging.Formatter): grey = "\x1b[38;20m" green = "\x1b[32;20m" yellow = "\x1b[33;20m" red = "\x1b[31;20m" bold_red = "\x1b[31;1m" reset = "\x1b[0m" format = "[%(asctime)s] [%(levelname)s] [%(process)d] [%(name)s] [%(funcName)s] [%(lineno)d] %(message)s" FORMATS = { logging.
